metadata.Title: CVE-2013-2061 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
The openvpn_decrypt function in crypto.c in OpenVPN 2.3.0 and earlier, whenrunning in UDP mode, allows remote attackers to obtain sensitiveinformation via a timing attack involving an HMAC comparison function thatdoes not run in constant time and a padding oracle attack on the CBC modecipher.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-2061` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

openvpn - 2.3.1-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openvpn package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.1-2ubuntu1').
